name: Squirrel Time
description:
Every 10 seconds you age

Play as a squirrel that ages every 10 seconds.

Experience all stages, from birth to death, in 100 seconds.

Every stage brings different stats, like size, weight, speed, climbing, and jump height.

Can you master all of them?

Climb trees like a real squirrel

Just like real squirrels, the trees are your home.

You'll begin your life up there  and you'll hopefully end it there too.

Lurking on the ground are evil foxes, so try your best to stay up there

Collect acorns till the end of your life

To reach the goal of collecting 7 acorns, you have to be strategic.

Some of them can only be collected in a specific phase of your life.

Can you find the right order and manage to collect all of them?

Controls Movement
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • W, Up or Space to Jump
Climbing
  • Jump against a tree or wall to start climbing
  • You can climb up or down with the Arrow Keys or WS
  • Walk in the opposite direction of the wall/tree to end climbing
  • After ending your climb, you can jump to perform a wall jump
  • You can't climb at the beginning or end of your life
Other
  • Press F11 or F to toggle fullscreen
  • Press ESC to return to the main menu
Credits

Game made by Finn Pickart

Youtube: Finn Pickart
